original: intros HUCR INT a b d1 d2 Hgcd1 Hgcd2. destruct HUCR as [HR HComm HNeut]. destruct Hgcd1 as [Hdiv1a [Hdiv1b Hgcd1]]. destruct Hgcd2 as [Hdiv2a [Hdiv2b Hgcd2]]. pose proof (Hgcd1 a b Hdiv1a Hdiv1b Hgcd1) as H1. pose proof (Hgcd2 a b Hdiv2a Hdiv2b Hgcd2) as H2. exists a. split. - apply (inv_com S Mult I a). + apply HComm. + exists d1. apply H1. - split. + apply H1. + apply H2.
